title: Why not :?

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: Why i can't rename to "Master of deception"

replies.body: Summoner Name changes must be purchased for either 1300 RP or 13,900 IP.  According to the image, it doesn't look like the account has enough currency to change summoner names.  Once you have the required amount, you should be fine to change your name as long as it's appropriate per our[ Summoner Name FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752814-Summoner-Name-FAQ).  Let me know if you have any questions!

I know that Sir. but even if you don't have enough ip/rp you can still check if the name is available.I have tested it "Master of deception" is the only name that's "NOT ACCEPTED" but if you try something like "abc" or anything else it tell you it's "UNAVAILABLE".
Ps: thank you for the reply.

It looks like in addition to the required amount, the name is also too long.  In this case, the name you're requesting has too many characters and can only be 16 characters long including spaces.  I hope that helps clear things up!
Oh. So that's what wrong! Thank you sir for your time and have a nice day.
